com.redhat.rhn.frontend.taglibs

Class FormatDateTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
      • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.taglibs.FormatDateTag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.IterationTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag

    public class FormatDateTag
extends javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
    FormatDateTag
    Displays a value in a human format (eg. 3 minutes ago) 
         <rhn:human-value value="${bean.value}">

    Outputs a human readable text for the value relative to now.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
